</ul>

<h3><i class="bi bi-robot"></i> AI-Powered Reporting</h3>
<p>Generate professional variance reports in minutes, not hours. Our AI analyzes patterns, identifies anomalies, and explains the "why" behind your numbers in plain English.</p>
<ul style="color: #757575; margin-top: 1rem;">
<li>Automated variance explanations</li>
<li>Trend analysis and forecasting</li>

<li>Export to PDF, Word, or share live</li>
</ul>

<ul style="color: #757575; margin-top: 1rem;">
<li>Planned vs. actual vs. forecast curves</li>
<li>Schedule Performance Index (SPI)</li>
<li>Estimate at Completion (EAC) projections</li>
<li>What-if scenario modeling</li>
</ul>

<ul style="color: #757575; margin-top: 1rem;">

<li>Percentage complete calculations</li>
